text: Gerald Scheiblehner (born 25 February 1977) is a former Austrian football player. He is the current manager of FC Blau-Weiß Linz in the Second Austrian League. == Career== === Player === He started in the youth of SK VÖEST Linz. His only professional club was FK Austria Wien. After this he played for SK Eintracht Wels and SV Wallern.Profile on transfermarkt.at === Manager === After he ended his career he became coach of ASKÖ Donau Linz in the 4th league. 2014 he became coach of Union St. Florian in the Regionalliga (3rd level). From 2015 to 2019 he trained SK Vorwärts Steyr. In 2018 the club was promoted to the Second League. 2019/20 he became coach of FC Juniors OÖ. After he was fired in 2021, he became coach of FC Blau-Weiß Linz. title: Gerald Scheiblehner
